data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cardoso, Giovanna Monticelli, Campos-Filho, Ivanklin Soares, Araujo, Paula Beatriz (2018): Taxonomic revision of Brasiloniscus (Oniscidea, Pudeoniscidae) with description of a new species. European Journal of Taxonomy 434: 1-16, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2018.434|5 occurrences
